column5: Although I read this site a lot, this will be my first post. I like fishing trout and muskie and live in the Ottawa area. Seems like a great bunch here, I hope to contribrute more to come.  Ater last year`s ice season, my better half came to terms with she was losing ground on enlarged fishing photo`s mysteriously being hung in various rooms though-out our house... livingroom was her decor choices. Knowing she couldn`t break the addiction she decided to help out and gave me permission for...`The Fishing Wall`...in the livingroom!  Feeling under pressure at the time I decided to fill this wall with open water pictures from this season of my favourite fish caught from Algonquin Park to Lk Ont and everywhere in between. Along the way, I was able to fish 34 different bodies of water, break 6 PB`s, fish with old friends and new, and most importantly enjoyed every second of it.  Believe me when I say, myself and fishing partners, fish in all conditions. Definately not all sunny calm days. Determination paid off in spades this year and I had one of my best seasons ever.  Started this quest the first week of March, bobbing around Lk Ont amongst the ice flows. My year only kept getting better and here is some pic`s of my season in random order.  Lakers        Browns            Inland Bow`s        Specks        Splake          Muskie        Lake Ont Salmon & Bow`s             I can only sum up this season as being truly fantasic. If I could relive this season every season I would die a happy man.  My `Fishing Wall`in the livingroom!
wow awesome post some really great fish and a beautiful wall
you had quite the year, congrats on all of the gorgeous fish!
nice post.   you'll have to share some of your negotiating skills with the rest of "fish wall-less" guys...only a month and a bit until brookies time!
you my friend are a fishing GURU !!! Thanks for sharing and welcome to the board.

Great introduction and first post Mike     Welcome to OFC Of all the pics you posted.... this one stands out from all the rest   What a gorgeous fish  Congrats on a phenomenal year Take a bow.... you deserve it!!! Leechman
Hey Mike. Awsome first post! That's a nice inland bow and that splake is a Bee--you---tee!!  I hope we get more than one post a year from you however. haha cheers.
WOW    Welcome.  You can catch fish out of a bayline cuddie eh? LOL  Just asking, as I own one.LOL   Beautiful fish.
Welcome and thanks much for that!
Very nice post. I love those square tails. The wall of fame looks great, welcome.
Welcome Aboard love all the pics. I must say you had me taking a second look when I saw the board name and read the post I knew I had not wrote it.  Cheers Mike P.
Great 1st post. With all the rules I can't believe T.J. and the admin allowed 2 names so close.   Jeesh I hope someone doesn't join with Nipfisher. that would really confuse me.
Wicked fish & awesome post! Looks like you had a wonderful year!!! Thanks for posting & welcome to the board
